FireStrike listened contently.  
"I am no idiot. YOU ARE ALL THE IDIOTS.  You are pawns in his private 
affairs.  Not for the greater bad of the Decepticons. And who cares 
if hears. So he tries to kill me, buto thers will follow my lead, i 
have started rthe rock rolling and otehrs will push it on.

> Nightstrike::
>

saw 
> his brother and said
> 
> "Firs of all... you're a perfect idiot!!!" said Nightstike witha 
low

> interested now to follow youer own? how I'm sure that isn't a 
tramp? 
> First. you said that we where created to serve megatron now you 
said

and 
> what ever you want to say say it with low voice Megatron or any one

>
